scripts.buildDepBundle: browserify -r director -r mobx -r mobx-react -r mobx-utils -r react -r react-bootstrap -r react-dom -r whatwg-fetch -v > public/bundle.js
scripts.buildAppBundle: browserify src/index.js -x director -x mobx -x mobx-react -x mobx-utils -x react -x react-bootstrap -x react-dom -x whatwg-fetch  -v > public/app.js
scripts.startWatchify: watchify --debug  src/index.js -x director -x mobx -x mobx-react -x mobx-utils -x react -x react-bootstrap -x react-dom -x whatwg-fetch -vo public/app.js
scripts.watch: http-server -s -p 3000 --proxy http://localhost:3001 & yarn run buildDepBundle & yarn run startWatchify
scripts.buildBundle: yarn run buildDepBundle & yarn run buildAppBundle
